structural_engineering_lib

Purpose
- IS 456 RC beam design library with Python + VBA parity.
- Design -> compliance -> detailing -> DXF/BBS outputs.

Install
- pip install structural-lib-is456
- pip install "structural-lib-is456[dxf]"  # optional DXF support

Python import
- from structural_lib import api

CLI (python -m structural_lib)
- design  : design beams from CSV/JSON -> results JSON
- bbs     : generate bar bending schedule from results JSON
- dxf     : generate DXF drawings from results JSON (requires ezdxf)
- job     : run job spec JSON -> output folder
Command discovery: run python -m structural_lib --help and python -m structural_lib <cmd> --help for full options.

Docs (start here)
- docs/README.md
- docs/cookbook/cli-reference.md
- docs/reference/api.md
- docs/getting-started/python-quickstart.md

Schemas / specs
- docs/specs/v0.9_JOB_SCHEMA.md
- docs/cookbook/cli-reference.md (output format examples)

Examples
- Python/examples/

Notes
- Units: mm, N/mm^2, kN, kN-m (convert at boundaries)
